snippet: Ms. Kane defended herself against charges including perjury, saying she did not conspire to leak information from a grand jury investigation.
abstract: Pennsylvania Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane says criminal charges against her are political retaliation for her investigation into pornographic emails exchanged between officials in administration of former Gov Tom Corbett.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Kane defended herself against charges including perjury, saying she did not conspire to leak information from a grand jury investigation.

headline.main: Pennsylvania Attorney General, Kathleen Kane, Denies Charges
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Official Says Charges Are Retaliatory
